flawed_nl_solution:
The discount on the shoes Marcus found is 120 * 30/100 = $<<120*30/100=63>>63.
That means he only had to pay 120 - 63 = $<<120-63=57>>57.
So Marcus was able to save 130 - 57 = $<<130-57=73>>73.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
